title: A Day in the Life of a Professor
description: Life as a professor can be hectic and stressful - especially when you're the only woman in a faculty of 140 men! From the classroom to the boardroom - there's never a dull moment. This little book contains five short stories describing some of my experiences – both strange and comical – to give you a taste of life as a professor.1. I’m Actually a Princess2. A Day in the Life of a Professor 3. Just a Typical First Year Engineering Exam4. The Ubiquitous Kenny Baker5. School’s Out!I hope you enjoy it! Thanks for reading!
author: Faye Hicks
